title: Drawing, "Milgrim: Sideboard", January 2, 1936
medium: Graphite, red color pencil, and black ink on tracing paper
markings: Stamp in black ink, lower right: DONALD DESKEY/630 FIFTH AVENUE/NEW YORK CITY
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite in stamp, lower right: 8431/F.S./MILGRIM, OLSSON/D. /1/2/36, 1/3/36, 1, S.H.K.; inscribed in graphite, above stamp: LICQUOR [sic] PROOF FINISH THU-OUT/SIDE BOARD/MACASSAR EBONY & WHITE LACQUER/PULL - MACASSAR EBONY/YALE LOCK ON RIGHT DOOR (SUBMIT SAMPLE CHROM./REFLECTOR IN RAISED PART OF TOP - SWITCH/FLEXIBLE WIRE & PLUG (9'0")/VENTILATION IN BACK - SHIELDED/INTERIOR/SLIDE UNDER TOP/DRAWER/3 SLIDING SHELVES/1 ADJUSTABLE SHELF, WHITE MAPLE; materials, dimensions, instructions in graphite
description: Perspective, plan, and elevation drawings for sideboard. Raised square platform at left of sideboard and base in macassar ebony with vertical grain. Reflector on surface of raised platform. Cabinet at right with rounded front right corner and squared back edges in white maple. Two cabinet doors with horizontal pulls in macassar ebony; lock on right door. Three sliding shelves and one adjustable shelf inside cabinet.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Milgrim: Sideboard", January 2, 1936.
January 2, 1936. Graphite, red color pencil, and black ink on tracing paper. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1975-11-998.
